param.label: JBrowse style.label
param.name: style_label
param.help: Comma-separated list of case-insensitive feature tags to use for showing the feature's label. The first one found will be used. Default 'name,id'

param.label: JBrowse style.description
param.name: style_description
param.help: Comma-separated list of case-insensitive feature tags to check for the feature's long description. The first one found will be used.

param.label: JBrowse style.color
param.name: style_color
param.help: Basic color of features. Most glyphs interpret this as the fill color of the rectangle they draw. Color syntax is the same as that used for CSS
